Name: Lekker Lekker
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Most unusual with apple, hazelnut and lemon freshness.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Tom Lawman at Snafu in Aberdeen. Lekker Lekker (pronounced 'Laker Laker') is Afrikaans for 'very nice', which is what Tom's South African friend exclaimed when he tasted this drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Lekker Lekker contains 137 calories
